name: Vmax Project Manager
author: Vmaxstudio

sections.description:
Project Management Plugin for your WordPress site.
It collaborates all necessary modules for managing your business.

Features

  • Show Project list
  • Running or archived project filtering
  • Project number summay view with tab
  • Manage project completion status
  • Monitor project deadline
  • Assign project to client
  • Manage project payment
  • Create single/multiple milestone for each project
  • Print payment invoice
  • Manage project tasks
  • Assign tasks to team member
  • Manage project files

Full Version
sections.installation: Extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation and then activate the Plugin from Plugins page.
sections.changelog:
1.1 – October 15, 2017

  • Security update and minor bug fixes

1.0 – September 20, 2017

  • Initial version released
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

Extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation and then activate the Plugin from Plugins page.

short_description: Wordpress plugin for managing your projects, clients, team, tasks, payments in a single place!
